ComicInfo.Series: Atomic Robo Presents Real Science Adventures
ComicInfo.Summary:
A cabal of industrialists have used their wealth and influence to flood Manhattan Island through a network of underground tunnels to destroy the nation's already shaken economy and prove the failure of democracy to usher a new order: The Triumvirate!
